because they, first of all, dont have stacking mechanics, the whole reason for the wolf was it DEVOURED camps, growing in strength and size, and when it hit the cap it merged with you, thus it is gone. other smite options dont have a cap or any sort of mechanic to put said animal around, thus it would be pointless.

{{champion:29}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:35}} Would thank you.
the only stealth champions who would would viably build devourer are {{champion:29}} {{champion:17}}  and {{champion:67}} . you could build it on the others but it wouldn't actually be good

That's slightly incorrect. {{champion:28}} can benefit from devourer amazingly. Couple it with BoRK, and your E does 24% max health, and you get to 2.5 attack speed right afterwards. Add in her Ult first, and there is 50% max health damage in mixed damage types. Since she's really weak early, getting red-smite for dueling will give the tankyness without a second item. Its a risky build and it has been nerfed on and off, but it is one of the most entertaining in the game.

I really like the wolf story because I had a feeling it had a back story to it and of course had to wait to find out more about it. :D
Also Vi jungle dev is awesome, I've tried it for fun and yep its amazing.
That's just me because I love {{champion:254}} . Don't take it as a recommendation ;)
I always get told when I jungle as Vi, "Go Warrior", but I always go Devourer for her and Shyvana. The camp clear is amazing.

the thing is warrior gives her q w and e more damage, through scaling and cdr so she can cast q and e more, all the devourer does is buff the w. dont get me wrong its good for killing tanks, especially cause they gutted bork, but vi shouldnt be focusing on tanks, her goal is squishies, which the w will still shred armor, but not do much in terms of per proc. warrior just gives more relevant stats for her ultimate goal... making enemy squishies die
**What about {{champion:19}}? I guess his relaunch is still for 2025. We will have to wait 10 years to see a real hunter wolf in league.**
